channel.title: Administrative Data on Josiah King
channel.description: Recent content in Administrative Data on Josiah King

item.title: the clue is in the name...
item.description: Life in the past six months for me1 has seen a shift into the world of ‘ADR’. For those who don’t know, ADR stands for “administrative data research”, and the tagline is about analysing public sector data for the public good. This all sounds great! Ready, available data about real-world institutions and the people who come in to contact with them! We’re going to learn so much!! As it turns out, I should have paid more attention to this acronym, the key word being administrative.
